#id=1
#text=Last night , I decided to take a bath .
#id=2
#text=I chose to take a bath because I find it to be more relaxing at bed time than taking a shower .
#id=3
#text=I put my hair up in a bun so it would stay dry .
#id=4
#text=I stuck the stopper in the drain so the water would stay in the tub .
#id=5
#text=I turned on the faucets and felt the water until I had the right temperature .
#id=6
#text=I made the bath a little hot so it would n't get cold too fast .
#id=7
#text=While the water was running , I took the bottle of bubble bath out of the closet .
#id=8
#text=I opened it up and squirted a little bit of bubble bath under the running water so the water would get nice and foamy .
#id=9
#text=I then took out a fresh towel and a loofah sponge .
#text=I stepped over the edge of the tub and sunk into the water slowly .
#text=The hot water felt so good on my skin and I instantly felt relaxed .
#text=I grabbed a bar of soap and rubbed some on my loofah before scrubbing down .
#text=After a good scrub , I soaked in the tub and relaxed for a good twenty minutes .
#text=Then I pulled the stopper out of the tub and sat there while the water went down .
#text=After the water was almost all gone , I very carefully stood up and blotted myself dry with a towel .
#text=Finally , I put on my bathrobe and headed to my room .
